Cogwheel.NAME: Cogwheel
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yArtifact at the start of each combat.

GenesisOrb.NAME: Genesis Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, duplicate all #yOrbs in your draw pile.

ClockworkPhoenix.NAME: Clockwork Phoenix
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yupgraded Construct cards can now be #yMega-upgraded outside of combat.
